title: MATRACA BERG: 'Lying To The Moon' & 'Speed of Grace'
description:
Matraca Berg has been the songwriter responsible for hits by Patty Loveless, Trisha Yearwood, Linda Ronstadt, Deana Carter, Patricia Conroy, Suzy Bogguss, Martina McBride, Sara Evans, Mindy McCready, Dixie Chicks, Faith Hill, Gretchen Wilson, Pinmonkey ... to name but a few.  These are two of her own albums released in the early 90s.


Lying to the Moon [1990]

The Things You Left Undone 
I Got It Bad 
Lying to the Moon 
I Must Have Been Crazy 
You Are the Storm 
Calico Plains 
Appalachian Rain 
Baby, Walk On 
Alice in the Looking Glass 
Dancin' on the Wire 


The Speed of Grace [1993]

Slow Poison 
Tall Drink of Water 
Let's Face It 
I Won't Let Go 
Jolene 
Guns in My Head 
Waiting for the Sky to Fall 
Lying to the Moon 
Come to Momma 
River of No Return 


192kbps Joint Stereo
